Topics to Cover: Linear Algebra: Vector space, subspaces, linear dependence and independence of vectors

Probability: Marginal probability, conditional probability, joint probability, Bayes Theorem
Probability: Random variables, discrete random variables, probability mass functions, uniform (discrete), Bernoulli distribution, binomial distribution

Probability: Poisson distribution, normal distribution, standard normal, t-distribution, chi-squared distribution, Conditional PDF
Statistics: Mean, median, mode, standard deviation, correlation, covariance, conditional expectation and variance
Statistics: Central limit theorem, confidence interval, z-test, t-test, chi-squared test + Practice

Data Warehousing: Measures - categorization and computations + Practice Problems

ML Regression: Multiple linear regression, ridge regression
ML Classification: Logistic regression, k-nearest neighbour

ML Comprehensive Practice: All supervised and unsupervised algorithms + numerical problems
